00015 class Plugins_Feed_Cron extends Common_Cron
00016 {
00017     /**
00018      * @var User_Accounts_Data
00019      */
00020     protected $_account;
00021 
00022     /**
00023      * @return void
00024      */
00025     function __construct()
00026     {
00027         // Call the Model constructor
00028         parent::__construct();
00029     }
00030 
00031     /**
00032      * Método encargado de establecer conexión con Linkedin
00033      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00034      * @param obj $auth
00035      *
00036      * (non-PHPdoc)
00037      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#connect($idp)
00038      */
00039     public function connect($account)
00040     {
00041         $this->start = microtime();
00042 
00043         $this->_account = $account;
00044         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00045     }
00046 
00047     /**
00048      * Método encargado de recoger los timelines del usuario y sus amigos
00049      * @return void
00050      *
00051      * (non-PHPdoc)
00052      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#update()
00053      */
00054     public function update()
00055     {
00056         try {
00057 
00058             $feed = Zend_Feed::import($this->_account->getAuth());
00059             $items = array();
00060     
00061             foreach ($feed as $entry) {
00062     
00063                 $item["title"] = $entry->title();
00064                 $item["link"] = $entry->link();
00065                 $item["description"] = strip_tags($entry->description());
00066                 $item["remoteId"] = md5($entry->link());
00067     
00068                 if ($entry->pubDate()) {
00069                     $date = $entry->pubDate();
00070                 } elseif ($entry->published()) {
00071                     $date = $entry->published();
00072                 } elseif ($entry->created()) {
00073                     $date = $entry->created();
00074                 } elseif ($entry->updated()) {
00075                     $date = $entry->updated();
00076                 } elseif ($entry->modified()) {
00077                     $date = $entry->modified();
00078                 } elseif ($entry->date()) {
00079                     $date = $entry->date();
00080                 }
00081                 
00082                 if (isset($date)) {
00083     
00084                     $item["publishDate"] = date("Y-m-d H:i:s",strtotime($date));
00085     
00086                 } else {
00087     
00088                     $item["publishDate"] = date("Y-m-d H:i:s",time());
00089                 }
00090                     
00091                 $items[] = $item;
00092             }
00093     
00094             $this->save($items);
00095     
00096             if ($this->debugMode === true) {
00097                 echo "\r\n Feed cron elapset time : ".$this->elapsedTime()."s\r\n";
00098             }
00099     
00100             $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00101             $this->_account->setLastUpdate(time());
00102     
00103             $data = array(
00104                 "lastUpdate" => $this->_account->getLastUpdate()
00105             );
00106 
00107             $accountMapper->updateFromArray($this->_account->getId(), $data);
00108 
00109         } catch (Exception $e) {
00110 
00111             //echo  $this->_account->getAuth()."<br />".$e->getMessage();
00112         }
00113 
00114     }
00115 
00116     /**
00117      * @param array $items
00118      * @return void
00119      */
00120     private function save(array $items)
00121     {
00122         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00123         $mapper = new Message_Mapper();
00124 
00125         foreach ($items as $item) {
00126 
00127             $message = new Message_Data();
00128             $message->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00129                     ->setIdUP($this->_account->getId())
00130                     ->setRemoteId($item["remoteId"]);
00131 
00132             $existingMessages = $mapper->find($message);
00133             
00134             if (count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00135 
00136                 $message = $existingMessages[0];
00137             }
00138       
00139             $message->setOwner(0)
00140                     ->setPublishDate($item["publishDate"])
00141                     ->setTitle($item["title"])
00142                     ->setLink($item["link"])
00143                     ->setData(array("text" => $item["description"]));
00144 
00145             if ($message->isValid()) {
00146 
00147                 $mapper->save($message);
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }
00151 }
